message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's worth much more to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this proposal works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, $9,500 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little further to $9,750. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's close this deal!
